message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Your turn to respond!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, Alice. Take it or leave it!
Not bad, but I can do better. I'll give you a counteroffer!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I need to get a decent chunk for myself. Your turn to respond!
I'll meet you halfway, Alice. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
Alright, you got me! I'll take your offer. It's a fair deal.
